amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: ? TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS ? SEC. 801. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to fund the Arthur Avenue Retail Market.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used for the Arthur Avenue Retail Market.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A029) Failed by recorded vote: 76 - 345 (Roll no. 334).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Flake.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
